Articles.Content: So, Armored Warfare is out on open beta. I was wondering, since I am having issues with KW Rocketry for my station builder series. Anyone want me to do an Armored Warfare playthrough for youtube?
Whats armored warfare? Could you post pics?

Whats armored warfare? Could you post pics?

It's a game played similarly to wargaming's prized world of tanks game. Only real difference is that they chose to focus on cold war to modern tanks, including america's Abrams tank and russia's T-90 tank. Here's a link to the website:

https://aw.my.com/us
